title: Readout of President Joe Biden’s Meeting with People’s Republic of China Director of the Office of the Foreign Affairs Commission and Foreign Minister Wang Yi | The White House
content: President Joseph R. Biden, Jr. met today with the People’s Republic of China Director of the Office of the Foreign Affairs Commission and Foreign Minister Wang Yi. The President emphasized that both the United States and China need to manage competition in the relationship responsibly and maintain open lines of communication.  He underscored that the United States and China must work together to address global challenges.President Biden expressed his condolences on the passing of former Premier Li Keqiang.###
